attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877239377. Balance of 5year/100 000km Warranty - 5 year/Unlimited Roadside assistance
Balance of 4year/60 000km Service Plan
Last Service - 2/12/2021

The incredible Suzuki Vitara 1.6 GLX Auto has a ton of features that makes this worth every cent. Features include a panoramic sunroof, 7" touchscreen infotainment system, keyless start/keyless entry, traction control, electric side mirrors as well as ISOFIX fittings. The larger than life SUV rides on 17" Diamond Cut Alloy Rims boasting a luggage space of 375litres. The strong 1.6 engine produces 103Kw with a fuel consumption of 5.9l/100km on average. It has also has a high ground clearance, leather & suede interior that makes driving long distance extremely comfortable. DO not miss the opportunity to take this beauty on a test drive!!

Trade Ins Welcome. Finance Available.
Certified Roadworthy Pre-owned.

Two-tone blue & Black makes the Suzuki Vitara stand apart from the rest. This vehicle is in immaculate condition with loads to offer its new owner. Some of the features include a panoramic sunroof, tow-bar, 17" Diamond Cut Alloy Rims as well as a 7" Touchscreen infotainment system for clear visibility through the rear view camera. The powerful 1.4 Turbocharged engine will leave you star struck every time you take it for spin. Keyless entry & push start, cruise control, electric mirrors traction control and ample boot space for all your storage needs. You have to take this SUV for a test drive to appreciate all that it comes with. The high ground clearance gives you a high ride from the inside the car and once you are inside you adorned with leather & suede interior, multi-functioning steering wheel, front and rear PDCs as well as ISOFIX fittings if you want to attach a car seat. Book your test drive with this amazing SUV today!!


Trade Ins Welcome. Finance Available.
Certified Roadworthy Pre-owned.

attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877239377. Balance of 5 year/100 000km Warranty - 5 year/Unlimited Roadside Assistance
Last Service - 14/04/2022

The Suzuki Vitara 1.6 GLX Auto - top of the range SUV that has a 375litre boot space for all of your storage needs. Keyless entry and keyless start & go gives you that added convenience when you on the run. It also comes loaded with a tow-bar, cruise control, traction control, electric mirrors, front and rear PDCs as well as a panoramic sunroof. Inside the cabin a 7" touchscreen infotainment system that gives you a crystal clear image from the rear view camera, multi-functioning steering wheel and leather & suede interior to give it that touch of elegance. The naturally aspirated 1.6 engine pushes out 103Kw of power with a fuel consumption of 5.9l/100km on average. This Suzuki Vitara has 17" Diamond Cut Alloy rims with high ground clearance giving the driver and passengers a comfortable ride. Book your test drive with this beauty today!!

Trade Ins Welcome. Finance Available.
Certified Roadworthy Pre-owned.
